plot: Kate works on a popular magazine as agony column writer 'Dear Monica'. Sometimes (infact most times) she cannot help getting personally involved with the desperate who write to her.
plot_en: Kate works on a popular magazine as agony column writer 'Dear Monica'. Sometimes (infact most times) she cannot help getting personally involved with the desperate who write to her.

title: Kate
